hero.description: Over a decade transforming spaces with metal structures, aluminium joinery and artisan forging. Custom solutions with the highest quality standards.

services.title: Comprehensive Solutions in
services.description: Every project is unique. From large industrial structures to delicate artistic forging, we offer complete solutions tailored to your needs.
services.pageTitle: Our Services | Metales Del Sureste Andaluz
services.pageDescription: Discover all our metalwork services: metal structures, aluminium joinery, locksmithing, automation, artistic forging and more.
services.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive metalwork solutions with over a decade of experience and the highest quality standards.
services.ctaDescription: Contact us for a free, no-obligation personalised quote. We are here to help with your project.

about.title: Over a Decade of
about.description: Since 2012, Metales Del Sureste Andaluz has established itself as a benchmark in metalwork in Almería. Our passion for metal and commitment to quality define us.
about.feature1Desc: We work with the best national suppliers to guarantee maximum quality.
about.feature2Desc: Qualified professionals with certifications in welding and assembly.
about.feature3Desc: We back every project with extended warranty and after-sales service.
about.pageTitle: About Us | Metales Del Sureste Andaluz
about.pageDescription: Meet Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL: over 12 years of experience in metalwork in Almería. Professionalism, quality and commitment.
about.heroDescription: Since 2012, Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL has established itself as a benchmark in metalwork in the province of Almería. Our passion for metal and commitment to excellence have led us to successfully complete over 500 projects.
about.valuesSubtitle: Our values are the foundation of everything we do and guide us in every project.

values.qualityDesc: We use the best materials and techniques to guarantee lasting results.
values.professionalismDesc: Highly qualified team with years of industry experience.
values.punctualityDesc: We meet agreed deadlines on every project.
values.commitmentDesc: We get involved in every project as if it were our own.

2012.title: Foundation
2012.desc: Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL is founded in Huércal-Overa.

2015.title: Expansion
2015.desc: We expand our services to the entire Levante Almeriense region.

2018.title: Automation
2018.desc: We incorporate automatic doors and security systems services.

2020.title: Innovation
2020.desc: Investment in state-of-the-art machinery for greater precision.

2023.title: Leadership
2023.desc: Consolidated as a benchmark in metalwork in Almería.

about.missionDesc: To offer comprehensive metalwork solutions that exceed our clients' expectations, combining artisan tradition with the latest industry technologies.
about.visionDesc: To be the leading metalwork company in southeast Spain, recognised for our quality, innovation and commitment to sustainable development.
about.ctaDesc: Contact our team and discover how we can help you with your next project.

projects.title: Featured
projects.description: A selection of our most representative work in metalwork, aluminium structures and artisan forging.
projects.pageTitle: Completed Projects | Metales Del Sureste Andaluz
projects.pageDescription: Discover our metalwork projects in Almería: industrial structures, aluminium facades, artistic forging, automatic doors and more.
projects.heroSubtitle: Every project tells a story of dedication, precision and artisan excellence.
projects.ctaDesc: Tell us your idea and we will help you make it a reality with the highest quality.

nave.title: Agri-Food Industrial Warehouse
nave.desc: Construction of a 2000m² metal structure for an agri-food industrial warehouse, with a self-supporting roof and integrated ventilation system.

fachada.title: Curtain Wall Facade
fachada.desc: Complete facade enclosure with high energy-efficiency aluminium curtain wall system for an office building.

escalera.title: Ornamental Forged Staircase
escalera.desc: Design and manufacture of a helical staircase in wrought iron with artistic railing for a luxury detached house.

puertas.title: Industrial Sectional Doors
puertas.desc: Installation of 6 motorised industrial sectional doors with advanced security systems for a logistics centre.

cerramientos.title: Security Enclosures
cerramientos.desc: Manufacture and installation of security doors and decorative grilles for a 20-home residential development.

mobiliario.title: Municipal Park Urban Furniture
mobiliario.desc: Design and manufacture of benches, bins, pergolas and decorative elements for the renovation of the municipal park.

escaparates.title: Commercial Shopfronts
escaparates.desc: Installation of tempered glass shopfronts with aluminium profiles for a shopping centre.

invernadero.title: Greenhouse Structure
invernadero.desc: Manufacture of galvanised steel metal structure for multi-tunnel greenhouse with ventilation system.

locksmith.zonePageTitle: 24 Hour Locksmiths in Almería & Levante | Emergency Coverage
locksmith.zonePageDesc: 24h emergency locksmith service throughout the Levante Almeriense area. Huércal-Overa, Vera, Garrucha, Mojácar and surroundings. We arrive in 20-30 min.
locksmith.heroDesc: Complete coverage throughout the region. Our technicians patrol the area to guarantee minimum response times of 15 to 30 minutes.
locksmith.seoTitle: Comprehensive Locksmith Service in the Levante Almeriense
locksmith.totalGuaranteeDesc: All our work comes with a written guarantee and official invoice.
locksmith.absoluteSpeedDesc: Mobile units strategically distributed to arrive sooner.
locksmith.seoText1: At Metales del Sureste, we understand that a locksmith emergency requires an immediate and professional solution. That's why we have deployed a network of qualified technicians throughout the province of Almería, with a special focus on the Levante area and the Almanzora Valley.
locksmith.seoText2: Whether you need to open a door in Huércal-Overa, change a lock in Vera Playa or an urgent repair in Mojácar, our team is ready to come in minutes. We don't use intermediaries, which allows us to offer competitive prices and direct, transparent service.

carpinteria.zonePageTitle: Metalwork in Almería & Levante | Coverage and Services
carpinteria.zonePageDesc: Metalwork, structural and aluminium services throughout the Levante Almeriense area. Huércal-Overa, Vera, Mojácar and more. Premium Quality.
carpinteria.heroDesc: We deploy our experience and craftsmanship throughout the region. From large industrial structures in Huércal-Overa to designer enclosures on the coast of Mojácar.
carpinteria.seoText1: Our presence in the Levante Almeriense is no coincidence. We have been transforming spaces with metal, glass and aluminium for over a decade.
carpinteria.seoText2: We understand the specific needs of each locality: the salt resistance needed in Vera Playa and Garrucha, the industrial robustness required in Huércal-Overa and Cuevas de Almanzora, and the fundamental aesthetic integration in towns like Mojácar.

common.address: C/ Paraje La Ventica, 8, Huércal-Overa, Almería

serviceDetail.freeQuoteDesc: No obligation, tailored to your needs
